title: Why do some players have non-basic skins showing on their profile page?

embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Get the free app for Windows or Mac to simplify how you share and bookmark today.

body:
As I was going through my friend list today, I noticed that 3 of my friends had a non basic skin. Here is a pic of 1 of them above. 
I thought this was only for Ultimate skins with icons yet I've seen this so I'm a bit confused and I also want to show off my favorite skin on my profile page. Any ideas on how to do that?

replies.body: You can! To the right of the search bar on your profile page, there is a gear icon. Click on that and you can choose which background you want to display. I believe you have to own the skin before you can display it, but you can choose from your entire collection :)
Thanks :). If you can, could you lock this so nobody else comments as I've gotten my answer?
Please visit the [Boards Discord](https://discord.gg/6JevFSb) if you want it unlocked again
can confirm, skin must be owned

the top right of your profile page there is a little settings icon, right next to the summoner search box.
click that.

Thank you so much lmao. I had no idea this existed! :D Now I can have a Dawnbringer Riven skin background.
 {{sticker:sg-lux}}
